name: cannibal apple
description: once upon a time there was an apple who was hungry so he wanted to eat his fellow apple people. controls: press w to go up press s to go down press d to go right and press a to go left there are touch controls as well in order to activate them you need to touch the arrow keys on your screen up arrow is up down arrow is down left arrow is down and right arrow is down let me know if i still need to fix the touch controls.
